org.numenta.nupic.util

  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.util used by org.numenta.nupic 
    Class and Description
    SparseBinaryMatrix 
    SparseMatrix
    Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
    SparseObjectMatrix
    Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.util used by org.numenta.nupic.encoders 
    Class and Description
    DecodeTuple
    Subclass of Tuple to specifically contain the results of an Encoder's Encoder#encode(double) call.
    MinMax
    Holds two values, a min and a max.
    RangeTuple
    Subclasses the Tuple utility class to constrain the number of arguments and argument types to those specifically related to the Encoder functionality.
    SparseObjectMatrix
    Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
    Tuple
    Testing to see if this is more meaningful than a generic native java data structure for encoder work.
  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.util used by org.numenta.nupic.integration 
    Class and Description
    PatternMachine
    Utilities for generating and manipulating patterns, for use in experimentation and tests.
    SequenceMachine
    Utilities for generating and manipulating sequences, for use in experimentation and tests.
  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.util used by org.numenta.nupic.research 
    Class and Description
    SparseMatrix
    Allows storage of array data in sparse form, meaning that the indexes of the data stored are maintained while empty indexes are not.
